mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT T.COST_CENTER_NAME FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_COST_BUDGET_TEMP T WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_GROUP_CODE T2 WHERE T.COST_CENTER_NAME = T2.UNIT_NAME AND T.AREA_NAME = #{code}) AND T.AREA_NAME = #{code}

SELECT DISTINCT T1.COST_CENTER_NAME, T1.DEAL_DATE FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_COST_BUDGET_TEMP T1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_COST_BUDGETTOERP_IM T2 WHERE T1.DEAL_DATE = T2.DEAL_DATE AND T1.COST_CENTER_NAME = T2.COST_CENTER_NAME AND T2.AREA_NAME = #{code}) AND T1.AREA_NAME = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_COST_BUDGETTOERP_IM (DEAL_DATE,GROUP_ID_1,GROUP_ID_1_NAME,UNIT_ID,UNIT_NAME,COST_CENTER_CODE, COST_CENTER_NAME,UNIT_ITEM,BUDGET_ITEM_CODE,BUDGET_ITEM_NAME,BUDGET_MONEY, ZSB_RATE,FLAG,AREA_NAME,ACT_ID,ID) SELECT T1.DEAL_DATE,T2.GROUP_ID_1,T3.GROUP_ID_1_NAME,T2.UNIT_ID,T2.UNIT_NAME, T1.COST_CENTER_CODE,T1.COST_CENTER_NAME,T1.UNIT_ITEM,T1.BUDGET_ITEM_CODE, T1.BUDGET_ITEM_NAME,T1.BUDGET_MONEY,T1.ZSB_RATE,T1.FLAG,T1.AREA_NAME, T1.ACT_ID,T1.ID FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_COST_BUDGET_TEMP T1 LEFT JOIN PCDE.TAB_CDE_GROUP_CODE T2 ON (T1.COST_CENTER_NAME = T2.UNIT_NAME AND T2.GROUP_ID_1 = #{code}) LEFT JOIN PCDE.TB_CDE_REGION_CODE T3 ON (T2.GROUP_ID_1 = T3.GROUP_ID_1) WHERE T1.AREA_NAME = #{code}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_COST_BUDGET_TEMP T WHERE T.AREA_NAME = #{area_name}
mapper.select: SELECT T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME, T.UNIT_NAME, T.COST_CENTER_CODE, T.COST_CENTER_NAME, T.UNIT_ITEM, T.BUDGET_ITEM_CODE, T.BUDGET_ITEM_NAME, T.BUDGET_MONEY, T.ZSB_RATE, DECODE(T.FLAG, '1', '占收比', '2', '定额', '') AS FLAG, T.ID, T.DEAL_DATE, T.FLAG as F FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_COST_BUDGETTOERP_IM T WHERE T.ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_COST_BUDGETTOERP_IM T WHERE T.DEAL_DATE = #{deal_date} AND T.AREA_NAME = #{code}
mapper.update: UPDATE PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_COST_BUDGETTOERP_IM T SET T.STATUS='10' WHERE T.INIT_ID = #{workNo}
UPDATE PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_COST_BUDGETTOERP_IM T SET T.STATUS='11' WHERE T.INIT_ID = #{workNo}
